name: Shapes Are Bad
description:
"Shapes Are Bad" is a attempt at a Rage/Platformer type game. Basically you are trying to avoid all the different shapes that are being thrown at you. Though, to make it harder all of the objects spawn in random places. Yep. You heard me. Every single obstacle is placed by RNG.

Issues:

As I was playing this myself I did notice when my laptop wasn't plugged in The game lagged a bit and everything seemed off. So if you have lag yourself hopefully that will help.

Music:

Freesound.org

Sprites:

Myself and an Art Friend

Voices/FX:

Myself
